attributes.action: Saying NO to Facking in Northumberland
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned are saying NO to fracking in Northumberland. Many reasons for our vies can include,
Road nussiance, wear & tear and congestion.
Pollution to the air and water sources
Effects on tourism
Effects to people's right to enjoy the countryside
Peoples rights to have a safe enviroment to live in
Economic changes
The right for northumberland to have its landscape left natural and be untouched by other than conventional means ie farming
To help sustain peoples investments within the area eg house prices
To ensure that no geological changes are made by man
